break-registration.title: Registration
break-registration.description_html: If you do not want to miss any presentation please register between 7:30-9:10. However, registration will be opened all day!

break-lunch.title: Lunch Break
break-lunch.description_html:
VIPs (Speakers, Sponsors) have lunch in Congresowa Restaurant on base floor.
Attendees will have soldiers' soup outside the building!

break-afterparty.title: AfterParty in All Star Klubokawiarnia
break-afterparty.description_html:
Free pizza and beer and follow up talks.
15min from conference venue.
Piotrkowska 217 Łódź
